sentences.sentence: I remember this paper I wrote on existentialism.
sentences.translation: 我记得我给存在主义写的这篇论文。

sentences.sentence: According to the theory of existentialism, Ba is a context, which harbours meaning.
sentences.translation: 根据存在主义的理论，“场所”是一个环境，有庇护所之意。

sentences.sentence: Any discussion of existentialism really has to begin with Jean-Paul Sartre's lament that the word is so loosely applied to so many things that it no longer means anything at all.
sentences.translation: 任何关于存在主义的讨论都应该以萨特的痛惜开始——这个词被如此宽泛地应用于如此多的事物以至于它已经没有任何意义。
